name: MTLTextureType
desc: The dimension of each image, including whether multiple images are arranged into an array or a cube.

items.name: case type1DArray
items.desc: An array of one-dimensional texture images.

items.name: case type2DArray
items.desc: An array of two-dimensional texture images.

items.name: case type2DMultisample
items.desc: A two-dimensional texture image that uses more than one sample for each pixel.

items.name: case typeCube
items.desc: A cube texture with six two-dimensional images.

items.name: case typeCubeArray
items.desc: An array of cube textures, each with six two-dimensional images.

items.name: case type2DMultisampleArray
items.desc: An array of two-dimensional texture images that use more than one sample for each pixel.
